title: Ritual Dagger
content:
Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

The leather handle is smooth with use, and slick with fresh blood.

Ritual Dagger Location & Where to Find

Location: on the table near Abdirak (Shattered Sanctum)

Ritual Dagger Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: ?? Weight: ?? ID: ??

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm
